1.0.0.name: wordpress/rsfiles-download-manager
1.0.0.description:
RSFiles! is the perfect Wordpress download manager that allows you to:

* Share a folder and its items
* Add screenshots to files
* Add download mirrors to files
* Add descriptions, versions and license information
* Create groups of users and set up permissions to download and modify files
* Use themes to display the downloadable files
* Keep track of download counters

RSPlugins.com - RSFiles! - Loads of features that can make your life easier when sharing files to your readers.
